mapper.select: select * from addressbook where member_num = #{member_num} order by num desc
mapper.insert: insert into addressbook(num, member_num, AB_NAME, AB_ZIPCODE, AB_ADDRESS1, AB_ADDRESS2, AB_TEL) values(seq_addressbook.nextval,#{member_num},#{ab_name},#{ab_zipcode},#{ab_address1},#{ab_address2},#{ab_tel})
mapper.update: update addressbook set ab_zipcode=#{ab_zipcode}, ab_address1=#{ab_address1}, ab_address2=#{ab_address2} where num = #{num}
